data.text: @jameskorte Hi James! You will just need to place them inside of your checked bag. For more information, please visit the TSA website. Feel free to follow this link: https://t.co/mFNqEaAKer - GM

@TannerWilsonMD Hi Tanner! Upon check-in, our system is designed to assign each minor next to an adult on the itinerary. In the event seating is unavailable, we will attempt to accommodate you. However, we are only able to utilize seats that are unoccupied to do this. - GM
@girlydevs Our records indicate that a member our team has replied to your DM. - C

@naresh0502 We are sorry to hear about this. Our team members are expected to be professional and respectful while providing the best travel experience possible If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM letting us know how we may be able to assist you. - C

And if you look to your right you'll see a pretty great wing...man. #EveryoneNeedsAGoodWingman

@Shayla43493008 Hi Shayla! We are sorry to hear about this. Please direct your communication to our ACAA Department at: acaa@allegiantair.com - C

@TweetsFromMarz Hi Gregg! The determining factors in when, where, and how often we fly are numerous and ever-evolving. These factors include but are not limited to: demand for the service, aircraft/crew availability, and airport/ATC scheduling. That route is going on hiatus after 08/15/2021. - C

@farnsworth_jen If you are seeking assistance, you are welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC letting us know how we may be able to help you. Please be aware that messages are answered in the order they are received. - C

@farnsworth_jen If you are seeking assistance, you are welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC letting us know how we may be able to help you. Please be aware that messages are answered in the order they are received. - C
@manuelj_smart Hi there! We are sorry to hear about this and apologize for your frustration. If you are seeking assistance, you may send us a DM with the details of your request. - C

@mattmeyer811 Hi Matt! We are so sorry to hear that your flight has been canceled. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with your reservation information and the specific details of your request. - C

@wickedwordly Hi Courtney! Our records indicate that today's Flight 2402 has been delayed due to airport conditions outside of our control. If you have a reservation with us and have further questions or concerns, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

@NinaNine28 Hi there! If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with your reservation information and the specific details of your request. A member of our team will gladly review your options with you ASAP. - C

@Jennsmouse Hi Jenna! We are so sorry to hear about this. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC letting us know how we may be able to help you. - C

@lezleena Hi Leslie! We are so sorry to hear that your flight was canceled. If you haven't done so already, please send us a DM with your reservation information and a member of our team will gladly review your options with you as soon as possible. - C

@brucekkelley Hi Bruce! We're sorry to hear that you have had a negative experience with us. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC letting us know how we may be able to help you. - C

@Samhart07 Hi Samantha! We are very sorry to hear that your flight was canceled. Please be assured that it brings us no pleasure to have to cancel a flight under any circumstances. If you need assistance at this time, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

@Chase_albanese2 Hi Chase! We are so sorry to hear about this. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with your reservation information and the specific details of your request. - C

@andsmithing Hi Andrea! We are sorry to hear about this. If you are in need of assistance and have not done so already, please send us a DM with your reservation information and the specific details of your request. - C

@BigggLebowski Hi there! We are sorry to hear about this. It is never our intention to inconvenience our passengers. However, delays are sometimes necessary in air travel. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

@PamelaS_Wood Hi Pamela! If you have a specific questions regarding a flight you have with us, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with your reservation information and the details of your inquiry. - C

@kira_humann Hi Kira! We're so sorry to hear that your flight was delayed and ultimately canceled. If you have not done so already, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC w/ your reservation info and the specific details of your request. A member of our team will help you ASAP. - C
@TheLoneCheeto Hi Preston! If you are in need of assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with the specific details of your request. - C
@momof8fay The website is not hacked. If you are in need of assistance, you may send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

@alisonabrubaker Hi Alison! We're sorry to hear that you had a negative experience while traveling with us. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC letting us know how we may be able to help you. - C

@Justaylo260 Hi there! We're so sorry to hear that your flight was canceled. If you are still in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC letting us know how we may be able to help you. - C

@coachmalone13 Hi Michael! We are sorry to hear of your frustration. Our records indicate that a team member has reached out to you in a DM. If you are still in need of assistance, please reply to them there. - C

@alannakalixo Hi Alanna! We are so sorry to hear about this. Please be assured that we take no pleasure in having to delay or cancel any flight and we will only do so when it is absolutely necessary. If your mom and sister need assistance, please have them reach out to us directly. - C

@Dlbraves1Long Hi David! We're sorry to hear about this. While it is never our intention to inconvenience our passengers, delays are sometimes necessary. We apologize for any inconvenience or distress you have experienced while traveling with us. - C

@princessierra19 Hi Sierra! We're sorry to hear about this. Sometimes, delays occur with little to no notice and the factors that contribute to these delays are not always within our control. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you have experienced while flying with us. - C

@parkandwreck Hi Karen! We're sorry to hear that your flight has been canceled. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with your reservation information and the details of your request, so that a member of our team can help you ASAP. - C

@DenaTompkins9 Hi Dena! We are so sorry to hear about this. While unfortunate, delays are sometimes necessary in air travel and many times that factors that cause these delays are outside of our control. If you have further questions or concerns, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

@ghostbitch666 We are so sorry to hear about this! If you have not done so already, please send us a DM letting us know how we may be able to help you and a member of our team will assist you ASAP. - C

@lime_burn Hi Brad! If you are in need of assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC letting us know how we may be able to help you. - C
@future_DrRodman Hey Taylor! We show you have sent us a PM for assistance. Your patience is greatly appreciated! -JH

It all started with a tweet.

After a Tampa Bay fan sat next to a cardboard cut-out of a Kansas City fan at the biggest football game of 2021, he took to the internet to find his new friend IRL. When we heard about #HelpMeFindFrank, we knew they had to meet! 

🎥: @iflypie https://t.co/ufPsFpTKoy

@ManningJose Hi Jose! If you are within 24hrs of your booking and your travel dates are more than 7 days out, you can cancel online for a full refund to the original form of payment. If you need help with that process, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

@jcrslud Hi Cheryl! If you have a reservation with us and have specific questions or concerns regarding your flight(s), please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC w/ your reservation information and the specific details of your inquiry. - C
@bob_hinshaw Our records indicate that one of our team members has replied to your PM. If you need assistance, please reply in the private message letting us know how we may be able to help you. - C
